mapper.select: select emp_no, emp_name, position_name, birth, low_dept_no, email, cell_phone, emp_tel from emp e join position p on e.position_no = p.position_no where emp_no = #{emp_no}

select b.branch_name, d.dept_name, l.low_dept_name from emp e join low_dept l on e.low_dept_no = l.low_dept_no join dept d on l.dept_no = d.dept_no join branch b on b.branch_no = d.branch_no where e.emp_no = #{emp_no}
select emp_name from emp_detail d join emp e on d.emp_no = e.emp_no where id = #{id}
